title: 'The Great British Bake Off' Season 9, Episode 9: "Patisserie Week" | Everything Is Cake
description:
Kate and Amelia discuss their favorite patisserie bakes of yore and the consistency of the patisserie semifinal (0:30) before diving into a handshake-heavy layered slice signature challenge (7:00), sablé Breton tart technical challenge (24:05), and entremet centerpiece showstopper challenge (33:35). Then they hand out their awards for the Soggiest Bottom, Best Sound Bites, Best Brit Fit, and much more (55:00).
Hosts: Kate Halliwell and Amelia Wedemeyer
Associate Producer: Sasha Ashall
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
